name: ableton-live
description: an MCP server to control Ableton Live.

custom.description: Run with Python module (requires git clone)

examples.title: Prepare a rock band set for recording
examples.description: In Claude desktop, ask Claude to prepare a set to record a rock band.
examples.prompt: _Prepare a set to record a rock band_

examples.title: Set input routing for tracks
examples.description: Set the input routing channel of all tracks that have 'voice' in their name to Ext. In 2.
examples.prompt: _Set the input routing channel of all tracks that have 'voice' in their name to Ext. In 2_
